name: CoC Score Sheet
description:
Do you play the amazing board game Clans of Caledonia? Have you run out of sheets on your score pad, or prefer not to use them? Then this is the app for you! Simple, easy to use and portable.

At the end of a game, simply input all the relevant scores (a reminder on how to score can be accessed from within the app). All the scores will be added up automatically at the bottom of the scorecard. To start a new game, press and hold on the 'total' icon at the bottom left of the screen.

Have fun!
